|area_code = |blank_name = |blank_info = |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |website = Official site |footnotes = }} Torreón () is a city in Coahuila, Mexico. In 2010, its population was 608,836 with 639,629 in the municipality. Torreón has a soccer team in Liga MX, Santos Laguna.
